1478000.name: OMSI 2 Add-on Citybus 628c & 628g LF
1478000.description:
Citybus 628c & 628g LF – add-on for OMSI 2 depicting realistic buses manufactured in Turkey, dedicated to Middle-East Europe, cheaper version of bus called a o530 produced in Germany. Most popular in Poland, Turkey and Hungary. Vehicles have realistic 3d model, textures and sounds.

The Addon includes 26 versions that differ in lengths, engines, gearboxes and driver’s cabin. All versions have adjustable mirrors and steering column. Realistic control panels (two types) and a ticket printer manufactured in Poland (available in English, Polish, and German).

Buses can be configured by 38 setvars with total over 107 options. In addition, 89 different repaints of exterior and interior with upholstery from cities like Warsaw, Budapest, Istanbul.

  • 26 versions, differences:

    - lengths: 12m (solo), 18m (articulated)

    - engines: 4 types (different sounds and dashboard for each)

    - gearboxes: 4 types (different sounds

    - big and small driver’s cabin

  • Ingame setvar configurator panel

  • Adjustable mirrors and steering column

  • Realistic control panel (two types) and ticket printer from Poland (available in English, Polish and German)

  • 38 setvars with over 107 options of configuration

  • 89 realistic and semi realistic repaints of exterior and interior with different upholstery

  • Realistic 3d model, textures and sounds

  • Buses are repaintable
